items.summary: WILMINGTON, DEL. (Reuters) -Jimmy Kimmel's late-night talk show was suspended indefinitely by TV broadcaster ABC on Wednesday after his comments about the assassination of conservative activist Charlie Kirk prompted criticism from the head of the top U.S. communications regulator against the broadcaster's parent company Walt Disney. items.summary:
As part of its Tech Refresh sale, Dell is offering Alienware’s Area-51 gaming desktops with up to $850 off. Multiple configs of this desktop are on sale right now with prices starting at $3,099.99 shipped. The most powerful variant with the Ultra 9 285K/64GB/4TB/RTX 5090 config is $5,249.99 shipped. That’s down from its usual price of $6,100, and $50 less than its previous low. With an $850 discount, this is the lowest price we have tracked for this desktop to date. If you’re looking for something a bit easier on your wallet, the Area-51 with Ultra 7 265K/32GB/2TB/5070 Ti is $3,099.99 shipped, which is down $650 from its usual price of $3,750. Be sure to check out the entire collection right here after you get more details below.
